attributes.action: To Force councils to provide better recyling facilities for council tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the time that I have lived in a council estate I have seen no attempt in the encouragment of council tenants to do their bit and recycle paper and plastics, there are no Paper Bins or Bottle banks close to where I live, make more of them available, as council tenants what to be involved in helping fight climate change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
